thread.title: 2017 Golden Globe Awards: Best, Worst & Wackiest Dressed Stars
thread.title_full: 2017 Golden Globe Awards: Best, Worst & Wackiest Dressed Stars

author: Radar Staff
title: 2017 Golden Globe Awards: Best, Worst & Wackiest Dressed Stars
text: Thank you for subscribing! 1 of 15 While some celebrities arrived in style at the Golden Globe awards on Jan. 8, others were turning heads for all the wrong reasons! Click through to find out which stars should kick off the new year by finding a new stylist! Worst: Jessica Biel may have been proud to show off her post-baby bod, but her dress had too many things causing distractions! Getty Images Getty Images Best: Hello gorgeous! Priyanka Chopra was not only ready for the Golden Globe party, she was glowing golden herself in that dress! Wackiest: Yikes! This purple-gray color with its bizarre bottom shape almost washed Anna Kendrick out of the picture. Getty Images Getty Images Worst: Sarah Paulson 's frown wasn't the only problem, her dress may have caused fans to feel motion sickness just looking at it!
